skills.name: Basic Attack
description: [[Basic Attack|{{sbc|Basic Attack:}}]] '''Senna''' blasts the target with her relic cannon, dealing {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects.

'''Senna's''' basic attacks can {{tip|critically strike}}, but they only deal {{ft|{{as|{{#vardefine:Sennacrit1|{{#expr:(175)*{{ccd|Senna|crit_mod}}}}}}{{#vardefine:Sennacrit2|{{#expr:{{ccd|Senna|crit_mod}}*100}}}}{{critical damage|{{#var:Sennacrit1}}|{{#var:Sennacrit2}}}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}}.|86% of the {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}} champions usually have.}}

'''Senna''' has an {{tip|attack ratio}} of {{#expr:{{ccd|Senna|as_ratio}} round 3}}, meaning she only gains{{ft|+{{#expr:{{ccd|Senna|as_ratio}} round 3}} {{sti|attack speed|{{as|attack speed}}}} per {{as|100% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.|{{#expr:({{ccd|Senna|as_ratio}}/{{ccd|Senna|as_base}})*100 round 3}}% of the {{as|attack speed}} she would gain if her attack speed ratio was the same as her base attack speed.}}

Additionally, '''Senna's''' base {{tip|attack windup|attack's windup}} is reduced{{ft|to {{pp|(0.5 to 0.35)/(1/{{ccd|Senna|as_base}})*100|round=3|key=%}},|by {{pp|100-(0.5 to 0.35)/0.5*100|key=%}},}}but is only reduced by {{#expr:{{ccd|Senna|windup_modifier}}*100 round 3}}% of the expected value given attack speed bonuses.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Basic Attack Senna blasts the target with her relic cannon, dealing 100% AD physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
Senna's basic attacks can critically strike, but they only deal
Senna has an attack ratio of Unknown value: ccd / Senna / as_ratio round 3">Unknown value: #expr:Unknown value: ccd / Senna / as_ratio round 3, meaning she only gains
Additionally, Senna's base attack's windup is reducedbut is only reduced by Unknown value: ccd / Senna / windup_modifier*100 round 3">Unknown value: #expr:Unknown value: ccd / Senna / windup_modifier*100 round 3% of the expected value given attack speed bonuses.
skills.notes: * At level 18, only with the per level '''bonus''' attack speed, '''Senna''' will have {{as|{{fd|{{#vardefineecho:as_lvl18|{{#expr:{{ccd|Senna|as_base}}+{{ccd|Senna|as_ratio}}*{{ccd|Senna|as_lvl}}*17/100}}}}}} attack speed}}, and will take {{rutngt|{{#expr:(1/{{ccd|Senna|as_base}}*{{ccd|Senna|windup}}+(1/{{#var:as_lvl18}}*{{ccd|Senna|windup}}-1/{{ccd|Senna|as_base}}*{{ccd|Senna|windup}})*{{ccd|Senna|windup_modifier}})*0.7}}}} to perform an attack compared to {{rutngt|0.5}} at level 1.

skills.name: Absolution
skills.blurb: Senna's Relic Cannon is slow to fire, but deals bonus damage. She can power up its range, Attack Damage, and Crit chance over time by absorbing Mist from enemy champions she's attacking or from wraiths that spawn from dead enemies.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Weakened Soul}}: '''Senna's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} and damaging [[champion ability|abilities]] on enemy champions apply {{as|Mist}} for 4 seconds, modified to {{fd|0.75}} seconds if '''Senna''' starts winding up a basic attack on them. If '''Senna''' applies {{as|Mist}} to the same target twice, she collects it, dealing {{as|{{pp|1;2;3;4;5;6;8;10;12;14;16|key=%}} of target's '''current''' health}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and rendering the target immune to further {{as|Mist}} applications for a few seconds. This damage {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.

Enemy units that die near '''Senna''' have a chance to spawn a ''Mist Wraith'' from their corpse, increased to 2 ''Mist Wraiths'' for epic monsters. ''Mist Wraiths'' last 8 seconds and '''Senna''' can basic attack or hit them with {{ai|Piercing Darkness|Senna}} or {{ai|Dawning Shadow|Senna}} to kill them instantly, granting her {{g|8}} and collecting their {{as|Mist}}.
* Enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} are guaranteed to spawn a ''Mist Wraith''.
* {{tip|Minions}} and lesser {{tip|monsters}} that '''Senna''' kills have a {{fd|4.166}}% chance to spawn a ''Mist Wraith''.
* Large {{tip|minions}} that '''Senna''' doesn't kill are guaranteed to spawn a ''Mist Wraith'', while lesser {{tip|minions}} and lesser {{tip|monsters}} that '''Senna''' doesn't kill have a 28% chance to do so.

{{sbc|Innate - Absolution}}: Each [[stack]] of {{as|Mist}} grants '''Senna''' {{sti|attack damage|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' attack damage}}}}. For every 20 stacks, '''Senna''' also gains {{sti|attack range|20 '''bonus''' attack range}} and {{sti|critical strike chance|{{as|10% critical strike chance}}}}, capped at {{as|100% critical strike chance}}. Additionally, 35% of the generated excess {{as|critical strike chance}} is converted into {{stil|life steal}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Relic Cannon}}: '''Senna's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} deal {{as|20% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and grant her {{as|{{pp|key=%|10 to 20 for 3|1;6;10}} of the target's movement speed}} as {{sti|movement speed|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. This damage {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Weakened Soul: Senna's basic attacks on-hit and damaging champion ability on enemy champions apply Mist for 4 seconds, modified to 0.75 seconds if Senna starts winding up a basic attack on them. If Senna applies Mist to the same target twice, she collects it, dealing 1;2;3;4;5;6;8;10;12;14;16% − undefined% (based on level) of target's current health as bonus physical damage, and rendering the target immune to further Mist applications for a few seconds. This damage applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
Enemy units that die near Senna have a chance to spawn a Mist Wraith from their corpse, increased to 2 Mist Wraiths for epic monsters. Mist Wraiths last 8 seconds and Senna can basic attack or hit them with Senna's Piercing Darkness or Senna's Dawning Shadow to kill them instantly, granting her 8 and collecting their Mist. * Enemy champions and large monsters are guaranteed to spawn a Mist Wraith. * Minions and lesser monsters that Senna kills have a 4.166% chance to spawn a Mist Wraith. * Large minions that Senna doesn't kill are guaranteed to spawn a Mist Wraith, while lesser minions and lesser monsters that Senna doesn't kill have a 28% chance to do so.
Innate - Absolution: Each stack of Mist grants Senna 0.75 bonus attack damage. For every 20 stacks, Senna also gains 20 bonus attack range and 10% critical strike chance, capped at 100% critical strike chance. Additionally, 35% of the generated excess critical strike chance is converted into Unknown value: stil / life steal.
Innate - Relic Cannon: Senna's basic attacks on-hit deal 20% AD bonus physical damage and grant her 1;6;10 ‒ undefined of the target's movement speed as bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds. This damage applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
skills.notes:
* Despite '''Senna''' dealing 1 damage to ''Mist Wraiths'', attacking them will calculate the {{as|attack's damage|AD}} (including {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers) and any [[on-hit]] effects for the purposes of {{stil|life steal}} and {{tip|drain}} effects.
* ''Relic Cannon'' is only applied if the attack deals more than 0 damage.
** Hence, it is not applied if the target is {{tip|invulnerable}} or '''Senna's''' basic attack's {{sti|{{as|attack damage}}}} is reduced to 0 or below.
* Dealing 0 damage is valid for marking and collecting {{as|Mist}} from champions, but dealing no damage at all is not.
** Hence, '''Senna''' can mark and collect from {{tip|invulnerable}} enemies.
** {{tip|Dodge}} prevents marking and collecting a {{as|Mist}} via '''Senna's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Q|Senna}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: {{as|Mist}} interaction with {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}}.
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} spawn a wraith each.
* Enemies will not see newly spawned wraiths while '''Senna''' is not visible.
* {{tip|Minion|Minions}} executed by allies with {{nie|Spoils of War}} have a {{fd|4.166}}% chance to spawn wraiths.
* A wraith can be hit by {{ai|Cosmic Binding|Bard}} and it will interact with it the same way minions or monsters interact with Cosmic Binding but it will not take damage.
* ''Mist Wraith'' has a spawn animation, but is targetable immediately.
* ''Mist Wraith'' grants a small amount of {{tip|sight}} around itself.
* {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} secondary bolts will ignore ''Mist Wraiths''.
* {{tt|Excluding|Due to lack of available metric}} the range increase, one stack of {{as|Mist}} values approx. {{g|{{fd|53.7}}}} ({{g|+8}} from ''Mist Wraith'' pickup, and {{g|+{{fd|40.5}}}} with life steal). The bonuses have a gross value of {{g|{{fd|46.25}}}} ({{g|{{fd|35.25}}}} with life steal).
** {{sti|{{as|{{fd|0.75 AD}}}}}} is worth {{g|26.25‬}}. ''Absolution'' effectively boosts basic attacks with {{as|{{fd|0.9 AD}}}}, making the value {{g|31.5}}.
** {{sti|critical chance|{{fd|0.5}}%}} [[Critical_strike#Critical_strike_chance|critical strike chance]] is worth {{g|20}}. ''Absolution'' reduces its efficiency by 14%, making the value {{g|17.2}}.
*** {{sti|life steal|{{fd|0.26%}}}} [[life steal]] is worth ≈{{g|9}}.

skills.name: Piercing Darkness
skills.cast_time:
{{tt|{{as|{{fd|0.4}}-{{fd|0.25}}|attack speed}}|Based on level, further reduced by attack speed}}
<!--Cast time scales down with attack speed - {{as|{{pp|X;X|showtype=true|type='''bonus''' attack speed}}|as}}-->
skills.blurb: Senna fires a bolt that heals her allies, and damages her foes. Senna can keep attacking to decrease Piercing Darkness’ cooldown.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit, {{tip|heal|healing}} herself and allied {{tip|champions}} in a line, and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a thinner line. The damage {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.

Upon being struck, enemy {{tip|turrets}}, {{tip|wards}}, [[jungle plants]], [[File: MistWraithSquare.png|20px|link=Senna#Absolution]] [[Senna#Absolution|Mist Wraiths]] and [[Champion_summoned_units#Targetable|any other attack-interactive units]] are {{tt|''considered'' basic attacked once|Piercing Darkness doesn't actually apply basic damage}}, while {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|turrets}}{{tt|*|Considers all turret-specific rules}} are applied {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
Basic attacks reduce ''Piercing Darkness' '' {{sti|cooldown}} by 1 second {{tip|on-hit}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit, healing herself and allied champions in a line, and dealing physical damage to enemies in a thinner line. The damage applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
Upon being struck, enemy turrets, wards, jungle plants, File: MistWraithSquare.png Senna#Absolution and Champion_summoned_units#Targetable are considered basic attacked once, while champions and turrets* are applied on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Basic attacks reduce Piercing Darkness' cooldown by 1 second on-hit.
leveling:
{{st|Healing|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.6}} per 1 Lethality)}}}}
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|40 to 160}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Piercing Darkness'' also applies most {{tip|on-attack}} effects to one enemy champion struck, and ocassionally to two.{{bug|2}}
* ''Piercing Darkness' ''cast time is always 80% of the caster's attack windup time.
** Because '''Senna's''' windup percent scales down with levels but her windup time also only scales with 60% attack speed, the precise numbers get complicated quickly.
** At base attack speed and level 1, '''Senna's''' attack windup is {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
<!-- ** The exact simplified formula to calculate the cast time is [ {{fd|0.XX}}-{{fd|0.XX}} seconds (based on level) divided by X% {{as|'''total''' attack speed|attack speed}} ]. TODO: do.-->
** Reducing '''Senna's''' attack speed via {{tip|cripple|attack speed reductions}} also increases ''Piercing Darkness' ''cast time by 60% of the fraction.
<!-- ** It is calculated from '''Senna's''' total attack speed after cap (2.5) and floor (0.2), making the maximum possible cast time {{rutngt|X.XX}}. TODO: calculate-->
** ''Piercing Darkness' ''cast time reduction per level via her own windup-per-level-reduction mirrors {{cais|Piercing Light|Lucian}} cast time values.
<!-- todo: table? -->

* '''Senna''' can generally target anything that is not either explicitly {{tip|untargetable}} or herself.
** Valid targets include anything that can be targeted by a basic attack from someone.
* ''Piercing Darkness'' will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their position by a sufficient amount during the cast time).
** It leads by (up-to?) 80 units.
* On-hit effects are applied in order of struck units' spawn IDs. This matters for effects that are consumed on-hit (e.g. {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}, {{tip|Spellblade}}), which are applied to the target with the lowest {{tt|Spawn ID|among enemy champions, this would also be the enemy first pick in Blind Pick mode}}.
** "Spawn ID" is an unofficial abbreviation to describe the spawn order for all units at the beginning of games, below are some examples.
** If '''Senna''' targets an enemy champion but hits at least one more enemy champion simultaneously, {{ris|Press the Attack}} first stack will be applied to that target. If no champion was targeted, it will default to the champion with the lowest Spawn ID out of the ones struck by the ability. Whether the effect stacks up on a champion or not when multiple enemy champions are stuck also depends on Spawn ID.
** If ''Piercing Darkness'' struck an enemy champion and turret simultaneously, with {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} fully charged, the passive effect will most likely proc on the turret since towers are often spawned before champions.
* For on-attack effects, they are also applied in order of struck units' spawn IDs. However, there are some specific on-attack effects that will apply to both the target of ''Piercing Darkness'' and the target with the lowest {{tt|Spawn ID|among enemy champions, this would also be the enemy first pick in Blind Pick mode}} if the two unit is not identical. {{bug|2}} {{tt|Confirmed cases|all under condition that the targeted enemy champion is not having lowest Spawn ID among all struck enemy champions}}:
**{{nie|Energized}} effects are stacked 2 stacks
**{{nie|Spectral Waltz}} are granted 2 stacks
**{{Pending for test}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent on-hit effects from being applied.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Piercing Darkness'' interaction with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

effects.str:
• Healing: (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 40% AP) (+ 1.6 per 1 Lethality)
  • Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD)

st_slices: (+ 40% bonus AD) (+ 40% AP) (+ 1.6 per 1 Lethality)

skills.name: Last Embrace
skills.blurb: Senna commands the Mist onto the first target hit, damaging them and then rooting that target and surrounding enemies after a brief delay.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit and sticks onto them for 1 second.
After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target, {{tip|root|rooting}} them and enemies near them for a few seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and sticks onto them for 1 second.
After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target, rooting them and enemies near them for a few seconds.
skills.notes:
* ''Last Embrace'' will not {{tip|root}} the primary target if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Last Embrace'' will cast from wherever '''Senna''' is at the end of the cast time.

skills.name: Curse of the Black Mist
skills.blurb: Senna dissolves into a cloud of mist, gaining movement speed and camouflaging her and her nearby allies. Teammates who emerge from the mist appear as unclickable wraiths to enemies until they either attack or get close.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' surrounds herself with an [[aura]] of mist and gains {{tip|camouflage}} for a duration. If '''Senna''' {{tt|breaks the camouflage|Attacking, casting abilities, etc}}, she regains it after {{fd|1.75}} seconds of not performing actions that [[Stealth#Breaking stealth|break stealth]].
Allied champions who enter the mist gain ''Wraith Form'' for a duration equal to the remaining duration.

{{sbc|Wraith Form:}} Gain {{tip|camouflage}}. Enemies will have {{tip|obscured vision}} of ''Wraiths'' moving outside of the mist. ''Wraith Form'' can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after {{fd|1.75}} seconds of not performing actions that break stealth. ''Wraith Form'' ends immediately upon '''Senna's''' {{tip|death}}.
'''Senna''' and allies camouflaged by ''Curse of the Black Mist'' also gain {{sti|ms|{{as|20%|ms}}}} {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds of not performing actions that Stealth#Breaking stealth.
Allied champions who enter the mist gain Wraith Form for a duration equal to the remaining duration.
Wraith Form: Gain camouflage. Enemies will have obscured vision of Wraiths moving outside of the mist. Wraith Form can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after 1.75 seconds of not performing actions that break stealth. Wraith Form ends immediately upon Senna's death.
Senna and allies camouflaged by Curse of the Black Mist also gain 20% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.
skills.notes:
* '''Senna''' can move while casting.
* Allies affected by the ''Curse of the Blast Mist'' aura receive a buff called ''Cloak of Mist''.
* Obscured units appear as ''Wraiths'', hence the name. The wraith model does not distinguish which champion is obscured.
** On the [[Map (League of Legends)|mini-map]], obscured champions will be displayed as wraith icons instead of champion icons to the enemy team.
* In-game, the 'Cloak of Mist' buff grants camouflage and the 'Wraith Form' buff obscures the unit and grants movement speed. However, 'Cloak of Mist' has the unspecified effect of negating the obscuring effects of 'Wraith Form' (i.e. the unit is not a wraith while inside the mist); the unit has the bonus movement speed even when they are not a wraith (e.g. inside the mist or an enemy is nearby); and 'Wraith Form' also grants the functionality of camouflage (i.e. the unit is treated as a camouflaged unit with regards to {{tip|True Sight}}, {{ii|Control Ward|Control Wards}}, and enemy {{tip|champions}}).
** Given this overly complex interaction between the two buffs granted as well as the overlapping effects, it is easier to describe the effects as a single buff that is modified in specific circumstances rather than trying to establish a new game mechanic.
** '''Senna''' likewise has her aura buff and the 'Wraith Form' buff, but her 'Wraith Form' does not share gameplay functionality with other allies benefiting from Wraith Form. For '''Senna''', the appearance of being a wraith is a form-swap while camouflaged (similar to {{cai|Demon Shade|Evelynn}}). '''Senna''' will remain in her wraith form when she is detected so long as the camouflage effect isn't broken, and her wraith's appearance is very distinct from other wraiths.
* Allied champions who enter the mist and have {{tip|stealth}} of their own will still gain the ''Wraith Form'' buff but they will not grant {{tip|obscured vision}} of themselves to the enemy while out of the mist nor will they appear as a ''Wraith''.
** Allies who have their own {{tip|camouflage}} and also have ''Wraith Form'' will be revealed to enemies from their stealth's detection range, not ''Wraith Form's''.
* ''Curse of the Black Mist'' will not activate if '''Senna''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during the cast time.
* ''Wraith Form'' will not be granted to allies that are in a {{tip|zombie state}} or are {{tip|channel|channeling}}. It will be granted to allies even if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.

skills.name: Dawning Shadow
skills.blurb: Senna fires a global beam. Allies in the beam are shielded and enemies caught in the center of it take damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' {{tip|sight|reveals}} herself before firing two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemy {{tip|champions}} hit.
The broad wave {{tip|shields}} '''Senna''' and allied champions hit for 3 seconds, and collects any {{ai|Absolution|Senna|Mist Wraiths}} in the way.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna reveals herself before firing two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting sight of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals physical damage to enemy champions hit.
The broad wave shields Senna and allied champions hit for 3 seconds, and collects any Senna's Mist Wraiths in the way.
skills.notes: * '''Senna''' will fire from wherever '''Senna''' was at the start of the cast time.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 70% AP)

• Shield: (+ 40% AP)
    (+ 1.5 per Senna's Mist collected)

st_slices:
(+ 40% AP)
(+ 1.5 per Senna's Mist collected)
